attributes.action: force the fa to revert the names of the football leauges back to Leauge division 1,2,3&4
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should be passed in law that the football leauges revert to their oridginal names...
Leauge divisions 1,2,3&4.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
